sentence: Prescott Republican Congressman Paul Gosar was listed as a “special guest” with the white nationalist American Populist Union at an event that will be on a date popular among white nationalists and Neo-Nazis: Hitler’s birthday.
title: UPDATE: Paul Gosar promoted appearing at a white nationalist social gathering on Hitler’s birthday -- but his campaign says he isn’t

sentence: UPDATE: A representative of Congressman Paul Gosar's campaign spoke with the Arizona Mirror after publication of their story to say the congressman would not be attending the white nationalist group's event on April 20.
author: Kelly McClure
title: GOP Rep. Paul Gosar promoted appearance at white nationalist event, but now says he is not attending
Paul Gosar’s office denies role in far-right event after group publicized it
